author: jkezza
post_text: March 27, 2023 at 1:25â€¯AM#1Im Trying to build a macro that selects all current output data into the programmer.Currently i have been doing it as selecting all fixtures and then selecting each attribute twice to then oull this data into the programmer.It works but it looks very messy and i dont really like it.Was wondering if there was a nice way to streamline this.It would also be good if this worked in blind as then i coould use the alternate command line and not effect the live command line as i have found this current process does not allow for this and results in a "off" dimmer output.
title: Select all attribute data
